text: @realDonaldTrump What a NASTY way to honor those who’ve DIED under your awful leadership & failed presidency! 12,929 US lives GONE because u didn’t put nearly as much thought into SAVING U.S., getting PPE to hospitals, and stopping the COVID-19 crisis as u put into Tweets about Election Day. SAD!

entity.name: Women lead House gains for Democrats as Republicans hold the Senate
entity.description:
The latest:

- Democrats capture the House as Republicans maintain grip on the Senate
- House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi said "We have all had enough of division"
- Women, Muslims and other first-time candidates secured historic wins on Election Day
